name: backend_tonajagua

scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: read -p 'Nome da migração: ' name && npx prisma migrate dev --schema ./src/config/prisma/schema.prisma --name "$name"
scripts.start:production: npm run prisma:migrate:deploy && npm run prisma:generate && npm run start
scripts.setup:db: npm run prisma:migrate:dev && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:seed

author: Decode Software
description: Microsservice designed for the Tonajagua project, it can be used to create establishments and manage them.
